name: Craft to Connect eCourse
description:
Craft to Connect is a six-week e-course that will take you step-by-step through the process of developing a creative habit with your little ones. Our upcoming session begins Monday, February 3rd, 2014. 

For more information, go to crafttoconnect.com

Together we will help you to gather the tools you need to live a creative life, find the time in your routine to make crafting a habit, and make the space (physically and emotionally) for creativity in your home.

As a Member of Craft to Connect you willâ€¦

- identify and gather appropriate creative tools
- analyze your families routine and pinpoint times where crafting would fit
- learn how to identify the right craft for the right time
- find spaces within your home (or outside of it) that work
- work through some of the frustration and perfectionism that comes with parenting
- come to appreciate the lessons in crafting failures
- explore your own creativity
- reflect on your hopes and dreams (and how to make them reality!) for your little ones

Other online courses, parenting books, you-name-it, provide one size fit all solutions. Craft to Connect will walk you through, step-by-step, putting together a tailor-made solution for your own family. At the end of six weeks, not only will you have worked through the logistics of developing creative habits but you'll also have identified the resources you need to feel confident as you move forward.

name: Print Subscription
description:

: : What's Inside : :

: : The Nitty Gritty : :

40+ pages
Full Color photographs
100# Glossy Paper - perfect for little hands and small crafting messes!
Printed and bound in the USA

(Back-issues available in the shop)

: : Issues : : 

Senses : : Touch - Delivery At Order
Senses : : Look - Delivery March 1
Senses : : Listen - Delivery June 1
Senses : : Taste - Delivery September 1

: : Digital Issues : : 

As a bonus to our print subscribers, we're happy to offer you a complimentary digital copy of the magazine as well. Email us after purchase - hello@craftingconnections.net - if this is something you'd like!

: : Shipping : : 

Initial magazine is shipped within 1-3 business days via USPS. Future issues mailed on the 1st of June, September, December and March, depending on the start-date of your subscription. Shipping cost listed below covers all shipping for the year.

name: Mini-Magazine Back Issues
description: AS A SPECIAL THANK-YOU, ALL OUR MINI-MAGAZINES ARE FREE TO DOWNLOAD THROUGH MONDAY, DEC 2nd. CLICK HERE TO DOWNLOAD 1 (OR ALL 9) TODAY!! Now you can catch up on all our past beautiful mini-magazines! Each month we offer a new mini-magazine, complete with the same look and feel that you love from all our Crafting Connections magazines. Our mini-magazines, however, are ONLY available for a limited time - just one month - as an exclusive thank-you to our newsletter subscribers. {Be sure to sign up for our newsletter, to get your free monthly mini-magazine!} : : What's Inside : : Each mini-magazine includes a single project, a step-by-step tutorial, "Explore More" and "Make Connections" sections (for the little ones) or creative ideas (for you grown-ups) on how to expand your project, gentle prompts to help you connect with your child, large picture pages, and a lovely poem to share with your little one. : : The Nitty Gritty : : 6-10 pages Full Color photographs Digital .PDF - perfect for tablets and iPads : : Issues Available : : - Choose Your Own Adventure! Quiche 3+ Ways - Elevate Art Memory Pillows - Story Shells - Concrete Garden Planters - Papier-Mache Tea Set - Up-cycled T-shirt Rag Rug - Nature Made Hammered Leaf Play Silks - Woven Washi Tape Journals : : Delivery : : Digital issues are delivered as a .PDF to your email box within 1 business day of order.

options.name: Choose Your Own Adventure! Quiche 3 Ways

name: Story Stones
description: We are taking a short Story Stone break. Please sign up for our newsletter to be the first to know when they are back in the shop! Sign Up HERE. While you wait, we encourage you to check out some of our magazines for loads of crafting & connecting with the little ones in your life. Connect with your little one through the magic of storytelling and bring your tales to life with these stones. : : What's Included : : Twelve assorted hand-painted story stones including a variety of images (not necessarily those shown in the photo) to help bring any story to life. Stones come in a lovely linen bag, hand-printed with an adorable talk bubble "tell me a story." : : The Nitty Gritty : : Stones are coated with a non-toxic water-based sealer to prevent chipping or fading. : : Shipping : : All items are shipped within 3 business days. Want more storytelling tips and tricks? Check out our post on additional easy story prompts and the guest post by famous storyteller David Sewell McCann on How To Tell a Story

name: Story Stones Gift Set
description: We are taking a short Story Stone break. Please sign up for our newsletter to be the first to know when they are back in the shop! Sign Up HERE. While you wait, we encourage you to check out some of our magazines for loads of crafting & connecting with the little ones in your life. Connect with your little one through the magic of storytelling and bring your tales to life with these stones. : : What's Included : : The story stones gift set includes twelve assorted hand-painted story stones including a variety of images to help bring any story to life. One hand-dyed and printed t-shirt with an adorable talk bubble "tell me a story." Stones and t-shirt come in a lovely hand-printed muslin bag. : : The Nitty Gritty : : Stones are coated with a non-toxic water-based sealer to prevent chipping or fading. Shirt has short-sleeves, is hand-dyed a bright shade of sea green, and block-printed with professional textile inks. Muslin bag is 4x6 inches and block-printed with professional textile ink. : : Sizing : : The shirt is available in the following sizes/styles: Lap-T - 18/24 months T-shirt - 2T, 4T and 6T : : Shipping : : All items are shipped within 1-3 business days.
